mapper.select: SELECT u.seq as userSeq, u.nickname, b.seq as boardSeq, b.title, b.content, b.insert_date, b.viewcount FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.writer = u.seq order by boardSeq asc limit #{limit}, 5
SELECT u.seq as userSeq, u.nickname, b.seq as boardSeq, b.title, b.content, b.insert_date, b.viewcount FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.writer = u.seq order by boardSeq asc
SELECT u.seq as userSeq, u.nickname, b.seq as boardSeq, b.title, b.content, b.insert_date, b.viewcount FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.writer = u.seq order by boardSeq desc
SELECT u.seq as userSeq, u.nickname, b.seq as boardSeq, b.title, b.content, b.insert_date, b.viewcount FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.writer = u.seq order by viewcount desc
mapper.update: update board set viewcount = viewcount+1 where seq = #{seq};
